definition: to make progress/to do better/fig. ambitious to improve oneself/to move forwards
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
motivation/ambition

sentences.english: One reason is the increasing upward mobility of the younger generation.
sentences.chinese: 原因之一是年輕一代的上進心增強了。

sentences.english: Encourage their children to learn to make progress, to foster a positive attitude towards life of children.
sentences.chinese: 鼓舞孩子好學上進，培育孩子積極的生活態度。

sentences.english: Highly-motivated and reliable person and pleasant personality.
sentences.chinese: 上進心強，爲人可靠，性格開朗。

sentences.english: It is proper that you should scold him for his idleness.
sentences.chinese: 你罵他不求上進是應該的。

sentences.english: Be willing to learn, continuously improve, and perfect ego.
sentences.chinese: 好學上進，不斷提高，完善自我。

sentences.english: One of the reason is the young generation is more aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 原因之一是年輕一代的上進心增強了。

sentences.english: Finally, I think a teacher should have the kind of mind which always wants to go on learning.
sentences.chinese: 最後，我認爲一名教師應該具有不斷好學上進的精神。

sentences.english: I’m smart, ambitious and have strong interpersonal skills.
sentences.chinese: 我聰明機智，上進心強，並具有很強的人際關係技巧。

sentences.english: The desire to advance of a youth is an asset of great value.
sentences.chinese: 青年人的上進心是十分可貴的。

sentences.english: Highly-motivated E and reliable person with excellent health and pleasant personality.
sentences.chinese: 上進心強又可靠，並且身體健康，性格開朗E。

sentences.english: Strive for constant improvement and take responsibility for your own performance.
sentences.chinese: 力求上進並對自己的本職工作負責。

sentences.english: Who says the children not far cry from those halcyon inherence. for?
sentences.chinese: 誰說九零後的孩子不求上進？

sentences.english: Even thenonstriving person has the problem of inertia.
sentences.chinese: 即便不求上進的人也面臨惰性的問題。

sentences.english: He had no forwardly idea or desire for enjoyment.
sentences.chinese: 他沒有上進的理想，也沒有貪圖享受的奢望。

sentences.english: Highly-motivated and reliable with systematical thinking approach.
sentences.chinese: 上進心強，可靠，並具有系統化的思考方法。

sentences.english: One of my roommates, Francis, is an aspiring actor.
sentences.chinese: 我的室友當中，法蘭西斯是非常有上進心的演員。

definition: to advance together

less advanced/underdeveloped/lagging behind/the younger generation/the less experienced ones

practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
platform/terrace/flat-roofed building
to launch/to develop/to unfold/(of an exhibition etc) to open
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
and/besides/moreover/furthermore/in addition
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
to break new ground (for agriculture)/to open up (a new seam)/to develop (border regions)/fig. to open up (new horizons)
